about_the_game:
Time itself is breaking up, and Dodger, the dishwashing dude onboard Penrose Space Station, is the unlikely fixer. Join the chaos in this 80s-style comedy, sci-fi text-parser adventure as Dodger tackles a cosmic crisis like no other! Experience all three episodes seamlessly combined into one complete adventure, now with NEW EXTRA CONTENT!

Explore prehistoric jungles from 300 million years ago, navigate a post-apocalyptic world 85 years into the future, step onto alien landscapes, confront personal demons and make peace with your past, and journey across the galaxy to aid ancient aliens in their cosmic clash against some other aliens!

Laugh all the way to the end of this intergalactic adventure typing commands to solve puzzles (the 80s are back, baby!)

Tachyon Dreams Anthology includes all 3 free Tachyon Dreams games - Tachyon Dreams I: The Radiant Fish of the Apocalypse, Tachyon Dreams II: The Bloated Can of Space Root Beer, and Tachyon Dreams III: The Rancid Buttermilk from Andromeda, as well as NEW extra content - more rooms to explore, more items to collect, more puzzles to solve, more story - more of everything! All three episodes now weave into a single story with polished art and text.

Game Features
• Explore the past, present, and future!
• Help an intergalactic race of ancient aliens!
• Type your commands to solve puzzles!
• Double-wide pixel-art that's straight from the 80s!
• Laugh uncontrollably as you watch Dodger hilariously flounder about!
• Fair, modern design - no dead ends, no deaths, all puzzles make sense! Too much sense!
• Contains all three episodes in the Tachyon Dreams series - including new extra content!
• Steam achievements!

highlighted.name: That's Not How You Make Glue

name: Tachyon Dreams Anthology

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 (fully patched)
  • Processor: 2 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Video card with at least 512MB Shared
  • Storage: 15 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2GHz+
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Video card with at least 512MB Shared
  • Storage: 15 MB available space

reviews:
“Cosmic Void's expert use of AGI's 16 colours is especially impressive, and I really appreciate the pixelated depictions of the galactic sky, swathed in lovely shades of blue and magenta.”
Rock Paper Shotgun

“Tachyon Dreams Anthology is a vibrant, joyous, and zany space adventure showcasing classic text-parser gameplay with a modern touch.”
X-Geeks
short_description: Time itself is breaking up, and Dodger, the dishwashing dude onboard Penrose Space Station, is the unlikely fixer. Join the chaos in this 80s-style comedy, sci-fi text-parser adventure as Dodger tackles a cosmic crisis like no other! This version includes all three episodes + new extra content!
